thread.section_title: Hotel d'Angleterre, Saint Germain des Pres - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Terrible disappointment
thread.title_full: Terrible disappointment - Review of Hotel d'Angleterre, Saint Germain des Pres, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Sylvia J
title: Terrible disappointment
text:
Last September (2016) I stayed four nights in the Angleterre. Despite its online self-praise, the hotel is mediocre except for its location. There is no elevator. My room, 46, was at the top of a very narrow, steep winding staircase. The ledge was almost nonexistent, so that opening the door of the room and getting in were actually hazardous; you almost literally toppled in. No shower; just a tub. Breakfast, laid out on top of a grand piano (what are they trying to prove?) was about the worst I've had in a hotel. No hot food; a small pile of cold, semi-hard-boiled eggs, apparently leftovers from the previous day. The coffee was very bad.
The desk personnel were mostly unwelcoming. Room prices on the website are considerably lower than what I was charged (191 euros). On the positive side: the bed and he housekeeping were very good; the chambermaid was friendly. In my journal entry for the last day: "Finally, with great relief, I left this terrible hotel."
